  • Classes in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry used by com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage 
    Class and Description
    RetryMode
    The retry mode
    RetryPolicy
    Retry policy that can be configured on a specific service client using ClientConfiguration.
  • Classes in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry used by com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.internal 
    Class and Description
    ClockSkewAdjuster
    Applies heuristics to suggest a clock skew adjustment that should be applied to future requests based on a given service error.
  • Classes in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry used by com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry 
    Class and Description
    ClockSkewAdjuster.AdjustmentRequest 
    ClockSkewAdjuster.ClockSkewAdjustment 
    RetryMode
    The retry mode
    RetryPolicy
    Retry policy that can be configured on a specific service client using ClientConfiguration.
    RetryPolicy.BackoffStrategy
    The hook for providing custom back-off strategy to control the sleep time between retries.
    RetryPolicy.RetryCondition
    The hook for providing custom condition on whether a failed request should be retried.
    RetryPolicy.RetryPolicyBuilder 
    V2CompatibleBackoffStrategy
    Adapter interface for backoff strategies that can be used in both legacy RetryPolicies and the new V2 retry policy.
  • Classes in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry used by com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry.internal 
    Class and Description
    RetryMode
    The retry mode
  • Classes in com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.retry used by com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.internal 
    Class and Description
    RetryPolicy.RetryCondition
    The hook for providing custom condition on whether a failed request should be retried.
